title: Acc hacked
body: My Brothers Acc got hacked and someone sent xXHero007 RP-Gifts worth 20 euro from my Brothers acc . He is really frustrated and I am trying to find a solution . Can Anyone help me ?

replies.body: Hi I'm his brother and I wanted to ask if there is any way I can get my account back even though the hacker changed the e-mail that was verified ?

-> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de

First you should try to contact the Support.
